What's your #RStats pipe style? 
A: by_cyl <- mtcars %>%
      group_by(cyl) %>%
      summarise_all(mean) 
B: by_cyl <-
      mtcars %>%
      group_by(cyl) %>%
      summarise_all(mean) 
C: mtcars %>%
      group_by(cyl) %>%
      summarise_all(mean) -> by_cyl
